entry.title: [SBG3][Cooling System] - Rack S311B03
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 8, 08:00 - 21:00 UTC

Jan 20, 23:36 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out maintenance on our cooling infrastructure.
Start time : 08/02/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 08/02/2025 21:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers in this rack will be unavailable for a maximum of 13 hours.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some cooling system replacement and upgrade.
The maintenance may be completed in less time than expected, and we are committed to minimizing the outage duration.
Thank you for your understanding.
